name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The Legend of Zelda: Adventure and Magic in a Live Theme

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Embark on an adventure with *The Legend of Zelda*, featuring stunning visuals and quick access shortcuts.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Embark on an adventure with The Legend of Zelda in this dynamic theme featuring sleek design and quick shortcuts.

Dynamic Live Wallpaper: Immerse yourself in the mystical world of Zelda with stunning visuals inspired by the iconic game.
Minimalist Design: A clean and adventurous interface that brings the essence of Zelda to your browsing experience.
Clock and Date: Keep track of time and date at a glance while exploring the Zelda universe.
Quick Access Shortcuts: Instantly navigate to your favorite websites with ease.
Google Search Bar: Perform fast and efficient searches with the engine selected by the user.
More Extension: Add unique features to enhance your browsing experience with a touch of adventure.
